autopair.fish > Auto-complete matching pairs in the Fish command line. Automatically insert, erase, and skip matching pairs as you type in the command-line: , , , , and . E.g., pressing inserts and positions the cursor in between the parentheses. Hopefully. - Insert matching pairs. <kbd>"</kbd> ğŸ¥Š - Erase pairs on backspace: <kbd>Backspace</kbd> ğŸ¥ŠğŸ¥ŠğŸ¥Š <kbd>Backspace</kbd> ğŸ¥Š - Skip over matched pairs: <kbd>"</kbd> ğŸ¥Š - Gracefully handle <kbd>Tab</kbd> completions for variables while inside double quotes. <kbd>Tab</kbd> ğŸ¥Š Installation Install with Fisher: License MIT
